satuhearty

Where Technology meets love.

Next Generation Wedding

We are a web design company that focuses on building beautiful, elegant and fast wedding websites (wedsites). Satuhearty was founded on October 16th, 2016 in Boston, MA.

Features For Your Wedsite (Wedding Website)

There's no limit to what we can do. You decide on what you want on your website and we will do our best to accommodate your request. The only limit is your imagination. Nevertheless, here are some of the features that most people like.

Personalized wedsites

Wedding cards are cool. Wedding websites are cooler.

Responsive web design

Your wedding website should look stunning on all devices.

Social Sharing

Include any social platforms of your preference.

Maps Navigation

Make sure your attendees don't get lost.

RSVP

Attendees can send RSVPs directly to your email.

Registry

So people can get you the right presents.

E-Guestbook

NEW! The coolest feature ever; the E-Guestbook.

Made with Love

You have to make your wedsites with love these days!
